TI: [C-fos expression in rat brain during seizure and electroacupuncture].
AB: C-fos proteins were visualized immunohistochemically in the brain of rats after seizures induced by injecting penicillin into hippocampus and by penicillin+electroacupuncture treatment. Three hours following seizures there was an evident expression of c-fos proteins in the hippocampus (CA1 area), dentate gyrus, piriform cortex, dorsal part of entorhinal cortex, and amygdaloid nucleus, and there was a dramatic increase of c-fos proteins in CA3 area and the areas mentioned above except the CA1 area where c-fos proteins apparently decreased after electroacupuncture treatment. The results showed that seizures can induce c-fos proteins in some nuclei related with seizure and that electroacupuncture can also regulates the c-fos expression after seizure.
AD: Department of Neurobiology, Shanghai Medical University, China.
JT: Zhongguo yao li xue bao = Acta pharmacologica Sinica
SO: Zhongguo Yao Li Xue Bao. 1994 Jan;15(1):73-5.
